main event: An observer in Augusta, Kentucky sighted a shaft of light in the sky at regular intervals during a one hour period at night.
interesting points: The event took place on July 26, 1949, The observer noted the light appeared at regular intervals, The military communicated with the observer, suggesting it could resemble a searchlight beam, No detailed identification of the light could be made, The observer mentioned geographic location as being 45 miles up the Ohio river from Cincinnati.
sighted object: shaft of light in the sky
witness description: observer described intermittent light in the sky
